code: import Apis,{endpoints}from'../configs/App';export var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(access_token){return Apis.get(endpoints['current-user'],{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(access_token)}}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(){return Apis.get(endpoints['get-all-user']).then(function(response){return response.data.results;}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});};
